Summary: small white reddish ball appeared on the horizon made a very large arc then disapeared in front of the big dipper.
divs: sighting detailsseattle, wa. my friend and i were on my front porch smoking a cigarette, looking at the planes flying over head, when i noticed a light that looked a lot like a satellite coming over the horizon. i thought it was weird because most of the time you can not see satellite's in seattle. it had a white\reddish hue to it. it was moving quite fast, and instead of making a straight line like a satellite does, it made more of an arc towards the big dipper constellation. as it got to the middle portion of the big dipper, it faded away. it was not a instant disappearance, there was a 2-3 second period where it had faded to about half of its original luminosity, then it slowly faded away. my friend and i were in awe, after it was gone.
trends: There have been 110 other sightings in Seattle
There were no other sightings in Seattle on or around November 2nd 2010
